trans-unit.source: Performs composition for containers.
trans-unit.target: 对容器执行组合。

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此类由<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>内部使用

trans-unit.source: You should generally not use it unless you are authoring a container.
trans-unit.target: 你应通常不使用它，除非你正创建一个容器。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 完成后使用类型的操作后，你应释放类型直接或间接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，使用一种语言构造如`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref>提供<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>访问<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class, optionally in thread-safe mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>类，或者在线程安全模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref>提供<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>访问<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if thread safety is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存在线程安全的否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class with the specified options.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>类使用指定的选项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref>提供<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>访问<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies options that affect the behavior of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定影响引擎的行为的选项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放当前实例所使用的所有资源<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`在完成使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>时

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法使<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>中不可用状态。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>占用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用`Dispose`在发布到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Previews all the required imports for the specified part to make sure that they can be satisfied, without actually setting them.
trans-unit.target: 预览所需的所有导入的指定部分，以确保，它们可以是满足，而无需实际设置它们。

trans-unit.source: The part to preview the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要预览的导入的部件。

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no composition transaction.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的组合事务或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>表示没有组合事务。

trans-unit.source: Releases all the exports used to satisfy the imports of the specified part.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用来满足其导入的指定部分的所有导出。

trans-unit.source: The part to release the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要释放的导入的部件。

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no composition transaction.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的组合事务或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>表示没有组合事务。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies the imports of the specified part.
trans-unit.target: 满足其导入的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The part to satisfy the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要满足的导入的部件。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies the imports of the specified part without registering them for recomposition.
trans-unit.target: 注册以进行重新组合的情况下可满足其导入的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The part to satisfy the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要满足的导入的部件。
